targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN 'Root' ELSE '$test_path' END AS node_title,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '‚Æå Parent' END AS node_parent_title,
    CASE WHEN STRPOS('$test_path', '.') = 0 THEN '' ELSE
        LEFT('$test_path', CHARACTER_LENGTH('$test_path') - STRPOS(REVERSE('$test_path'), '.'))
    END AS node_parent_path,
    CASE WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN '' ELSE '‚Æå Root' END AS node_root_title,
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.architecture AS architecture,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    builds.architecture
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC,
    tests_num DESC,
    builds.architecture ASC

SELECT
    date_bin(($__interval_ms * 50 || ' milliseconds')::interval,
             tests.start_time,
             TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000)) AS time,
    COALESCE(tests.status::text, 'UNKNOWN') AS metric,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON
    builds.id = tests.build_id AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
WHERE
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    ($origin = '%' or tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    NOT tests.waived AND
    ('$test_path' = '' AND tests.path IS NOT NULL OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    tests.origin LIKE $origin
GROUP BY
    time, tests.status
ORDER BY
    time

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.config_name AS config_name,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    builds.config_name
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC,
    tests_num DESC,
    builds.config_name ASC

/* Aggregate */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT origin, ', ') AS origins,
    TRIM(TRAILING '.' FROM base_prefix) AS path,
    TRIM(
        TRAILING '.' FROM
        CASE
            WHEN '$test_path' = '' THEN LEFT(base_prefix, CHAR_LENGTH(base_prefix) - 1)
            ELSE SUBSTRING(base_prefix FROM CHARACTER_LENGTH('$test_path') + 2)
        END
    ) AS name,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT architecture, ', ') AS architectures,
    COUNT(id) AS tests,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], status::text), 0) - COALESCE(waived::int, 2) * 7) AS status_num

FROM (
    /* Filter tests and extract path prefixes */
    SELECT
        tests.origin,
        tests.id,
        /*
         * Prefix one level deeper than the displayed test's path,
         * i.e. the prefix children of this test should have
         */
        COALESCE(
            /*
             * Handle the parent node of this test being displayed:
             * cut the test path up to and including the first dot
             * after the currently-displayed test's path, if possible.
             */
            LEFT(
                tests.path,
                LENGTH('$test_path') +
                NULLIF(POSITION('.' IN SUBSTRING(tests.path FROM LENGTH('$test_path') + 2)), 0) +
                1
            ),
            /* Handle this test's node being displayed */
            tests.path || '.'
        ) AS base_prefix,
        builds.architecture,
        tests.status AS status,
        tests.waived AS waived
    FROM tests
    INNER JOIN
        builds
        ON
            tests.build_id = builds.id AND
            ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
            ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
    WHERE
        tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        ($origin = '%' or tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
        tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
        ('$test_path' = '' OR STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.'))
) AS filtered_tests
GROUP BY
    base_prefix
ORDER BY
    tests DESC,
    base_prefix ASC

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.git_repository_url AS git_repository_url,
    checkouts.git_repository_branch AS git_repository_branch,
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT builds.architecture, ', ') AS architectures,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_count,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
INNER JOIN checkouts ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    ('$test_path' = '' AND tests.path IS NOT NULL OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name) AND
    git_repository_url IS NOT NULL AND
    git_repository_branch IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    git_repository_url,
    git_repository_branch
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    tests_count DESC NULLS LAST,
    git_repository_url ASC,
    git_repository_branch ASC

/*
 * Truncate a string with an ellipsis at spe—Åified length.
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.TRUNCATE(str TEXT, len INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    IF len = 0 OR CHAR_LENGTH(str) <= len THEN
        RETURN str;
    ELSE
        RETURN SUBSTRING(str FROM 1 FOR len - 1) || '‚Ä¶';
    END IF;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

/*
 * Replace NULL or empty string with a non-breaking space,
 * truncate anything else with ellipsis, if necessary.
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(str TEXT, len INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    IF str IS NULL OR str = '' THEN
        RETURN ' ';
    ELSE
        RETURN pg_temp.TRUNCATE(str, len);
    END IF;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

/*
 * Format an array of strings as a three-line text with ellipsis
 */
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(strs TEXT[], width INT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
BEGIN
    RETURN CONCAT_WS(
        E'\n',
        pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[1], width),
        pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[2], width),
        CASE WHEN array_length(strs, 1) > 3 THEN '‚Ä¶' ELSE pg_temp.BLANK_OR_TRUNCATE(strs[3], width) END
    );
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

WITH
    revision_sources AS (
        SELECT
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_url_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                128
            ) AS git_repository_urls_text,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_repository_branch_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_repository_branches_text,
            pg_temp.ARRAY_TO_TEXT(
                ARRAY_AGG(git_commit_name_str
                          ORDER BY rank DESC, git_repository_url_str,
                                   git_repository_branch_str, git_commit_name_str),
                32
            ) AS git_commit_names_text
        FROM (
            SELECT
                git_commit_hash,
                patchset_hash,
                git_repository_url_str,
                git_repository_branch_str,
                git_commit_name_str,
                CASE WHEN git_repository_url_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 4 END +
                    CASE WHEN git_repository_branch_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 2 END +
                    CASE WHEN git_commit_name_str = '' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS rank
            FROM (
                SELECT DISTINCT
                    git_commit_hash,
                    patchset_hash,
                    COALESCE(git_repository_url, '') AS git_repository_url_str,
                    COALESCE(git_repository_branch, '') AS git_repository_branch_str,
                    COALESCE(git_commit_name, '') AS git_commit_name_str
                FROM
                    checkouts
            ) AS distinct_revisions_with_info
        ) AS ranked_distinct_revisions_with_info
        GROUP BY
            git_commit_hash,
            patchset_hash
    )
/* Massage and join with sources */
SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    revisions.git_commit_hash,
    revisions.patchset_hash,
    origins_str,
    LEFT(revisions.git_commit_hash, 12) AS git_commit_hash_short,
    revision_sources.git_repository_urls_text,
    revision_sources.git_repository_branches_text,
    revision_sources.git_commit_names_text,
    LEFT(revisions.patchset_hash, 12) AS patchset_hash_short,
    COALESCE(CAST(checkouts_start_time AS TEXT), '') AS checkouts_start_time_str,
    tests_num,
    tests_status_num
FROM (
    SELECT
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash,
        STRING_AGG(DISTINCT checkouts.origin, ', ') AS origins_str,
        MIN(checkouts.start_time) AS checkouts_start_time,
        COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_num,
        MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
    FROM tests
    INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
    INNER JOIN checkouts ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
    WHERE
        ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
        tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
        tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
        ('$test_path' = '' OR
         tests.path = '$test_path' OR
         STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
        ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
        ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
    GROUP BY
        checkouts.git_commit_hash,
        checkouts.patchset_hash
) AS revisions
INNER JOIN
    revision_sources
    ON
        revision_sources.git_commit_hash = revisions.git_commit_hash AND
        revision_sources.patchset_hash = revisions.patchset_hash
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC,
    checkouts_start_time DESC

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    checkouts.id,
    FIRST(checkouts.origin) AS origin,
    COALESCE(FIRST(checkouts.git_repository_url), '') AS git_repository_url_str,
    COALESCE(FIRST(checkouts.git_repository_branch), '') AS git_repository_branch_str,
    LEFT(FIRST(checkouts.git_commit_hash), 12) AS git_commit_hash_short,
    COALESCE(FIRST(checkouts.git_commit_name), '') AS git_commit_name_str,
    LEFT(FIRST(checkouts.patchset_hash), 12) AS patchset_hash_short,
    COALESCE(CAST(FIRST(checkouts.start_time) AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
INNER JOIN checkouts ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    checkouts.id
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    FIRST(checkouts.start_time) DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    builds.id AS id,
    FIRST(builds.origin) AS origin,
    FIRST(builds.architecture) AS architecture,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(FIRST(builds.compiler), '^(.{48}).+$', '\1‚Ä¶') AS compiler,
    REGEXP_REPLACE(FIRST(builds.config_name), '^(.{48}).+$', '\1‚Ä¶') AS config_name,
    COALESCE(CAST(FIRST(builds.start_time) AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(TO_CHAR(FIRST(builds.duration) * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'), '') AS duration_str,
    FIRST(builds.comment) AS comment,
    COUNT(tests.id) AS tests_num,
    MAX(COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7) AS tests_status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    tests.path IS NOT NULL AND
    ('$test_path' = '' OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
GROUP BY
    builds.id
ORDER BY
    tests_status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    FIRST(builds.start_time) ASC NULLS LAST

SELECT
    CASE WHEN $origin = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $origin END AS origin_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_architecture = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_architecture END AS build_architecture_param,
    CASE WHEN $build_config_name = '%' THEN 'All' ELSE $build_config_name END AS build_config_name_param,
    tests.id,
    tests.origin,
    tests.path,
    tests.comment,
    builds.architecture,
    COALESCE(CAST(tests.start_time AS TEXT), '') AS start_time_str,
    COALESCE(
        TO_CHAR(tests.duration * INTERVAL '1 second', 'HH24:MI:SS.MS'),
        ''
    ) AS duration_str,
    COALESCE(array_position(ARRAY['SKIP', 'DONE', 'PASS', 'MISS', 'ERROR', 'FAIL'], tests.status::text), 0) - COALESCE(tests.waived::int, 2) * 7 AS status_num
FROM tests
INNER JOIN builds ON builds.id = tests.build_id
INNER JOIN checkouts ON checkouts.id = builds.checkout_id
WHERE
    ($origin = '%' OR tests.origin LIKE $origin) AND
    tests.start_time BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP($__from / 1000) AND TO_TIMESTAMP($__to / 1000) AND
    ('$test_path' = '' AND tests.path IS NOT NULL OR
     tests.path = '$test_path' OR
     STARTS_WITH(tests.path, '$test_path' || '.')) AND
    ($build_architecture = '%' OR builds.architecture LIKE $build_architecture) AND
    ($build_config_name = '%' OR builds.config_name LIKE $build_config_name)
ORDER BY
    status_num DESC NULLS LAST,
    tests.path ASC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 2048

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT origin FROM builds /* Workaround, should be SELECT DISTINCT origin FROM tests, but performance of the latter should be improved */
list.label: Origin
list.name: origin
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT origin FROM builds /* Workaround, should be SELECT DISTINCT origin FROM tests, but performance of the latter should be improved */
